issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
I got an error "Android SDK were not found in specified location" while setting android sdk path in Preference.

I tried following suggestions
1) Restart Appcelerator studio
2) Delete config.json file in .titanium folder
3) moved  android sdk folder to C:\
4) Updated all android API using android sdk manager
5) download android sdk via Dashboard / andriod sdk configure in Preference 

Still shows same error
fields.summary: Android SDK were not found in specified location
fields.environment:
Windows 10 Operating System
Axway Appcelerator Studio 4.10

comments.body: Hello, Please send the "appc ti setup check" log in here. Run the command in cmd. Thanks.

Hi,
$ appc ti setup check

The rebuild was unsuccessful, please run the following command to re-build for the newer version:
appc use 6.3.0 --force

        logger.error('An uncaught exception was thrown!');
               ^

    at process._fatalException (bootstrap_node.js:374:26)
